room_title: Escape room "Chapter Two: Norcross Art Gallery" by Evil Genius Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: What an excellent experience. It was our first time. The Art Gallery set up was amazing and well thought out. Think Davinci Code. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Chapter Two: Norcross Art Gallery" by Evil Genius Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: First time doing a escape room and it was pretty awesome! The story line was pretty good, it was challenging and fun at the same time! Totally worth it can't wait for the next chapter!!

room_title: Escape room "Chapter Two: Norcross Art Gallery" by Evil Genius Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Amazing! I've done about 15 rooms in LA and this one makes one of the best, original puzzles very well thought out. What I like most is the level of imersion in this game you really do fell like part of the story. You seriously need to try it out regardless if you're and experienced or beginner. Can't wait to try the other chapters !!! MUST TRY
